original_text: For that reason, a leader of the church must live a life that everyone knows is good. He must be the husband of one wife. He must think seriously about how he lives and he must control himself well. He must be someone that people respect. He must be happy to have visitors in his home. He must be a good teacher.
korean_text: 그러므로 감독은 책망할 것이 없으며 한 아내의 남편이 되며 절제하며 신중하며 단정하며 나그네를 대접하며 가르치기를 잘하며

sentences.original_text: a leader of the church must live a life
He must be the husband of one wife
He must think seriously about how he lives
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 어떻게 사는지 진지하게 생각해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and he must control himself well
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 자신을 잘 통제해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must be someone that people respect
He must be happy to have visitors in his home
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 집에 손님들이 오는 것을 기뻐해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must be a good teacher
